entry.title: his early life (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in his early life, Joe Biden (pictured) was known by his classmates for his cramming abilities?

entry.title: Phyllis Le Cappelaine Burke (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Phyllis Le Cappelaine Burke helped found the Sydney chapter of the St. Joan Social and Political Alliance, which advocated for equal rights for women?

entry.title: Long Bow Trilogy (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that films from the Long Bow Trilogy depict the same village and villagers mentioned in Fanshen?

entry.title: a willow maze (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a willow maze in Sussex, England, planted in the shape of a quotation from the Bible in the 1990s, only came to wider notice when it was spotted on Google Earth in 2013?

entry.title: Gunilla Kreiss (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that mathematician Gunilla Kreiss, the daughter of Heinz-Otto Kreiss, later became his granddaughter?

entry.title: Dragos Gemelos (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Dragos Gemelos are two entwined dragon trees said to represent twin brothers who dueled for the love of a woman?

entry.title: Miao Poya (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Miao Poya successfully campaigned to change her high school's uniform policy before becoming one of the first Taipei city councillors to be openly lesbian?
